org.apache.accumulo.cluster.standalone

Class StandaloneAccumuloCluster

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.accumulo.cluster.standalone.StandaloneAccumuloCluster
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AccumuloCluster

    public class StandaloneAccumuloCluster
extends java.lang.Object
implements AccumuloCluster
    AccumuloCluster implementation to connect to an existing deployment of Accumulo
Shall be called with ClientConfiguration, Instance.
